terms.state_space: The set of all possible states of a system
terms.observation_space: The set of all possible observations
terms.action_space: The set of all possible actions
terms.generative_model: A model that describes how observations are generated
terms.recognition_model: A model that describes how states are inferred
terms.free_energy: A measure of surprise or prediction error
terms.active_inference: A framework for understanding behavior and perception
